AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Your Intelligence and Charisma scores each increase by 1.

ChoiceFeature.Name: Breadth of Knowledge
ChoiceFeature.Text: You gain proficiency in any combination of four skills or with four tools of your choice.

SkillProficiencyChoiceFeature.Name: Skill
SkillProficiencyChoiceFeature.Text: You gain proficiency in a skill

ToolProficiencyChoiceConditionFeature.Name: Tool
ToolProficiencyChoiceConditionFeature.Text: You gain proficiency in a tool
ToolProficiencyChoiceConditionFeature.Condition: Tool and not Weapon and not Armor and not Shield

SubRace.Name: Nephalia
SubRace.Description: Beneath an ever-present shroud of fog billowing in from the sea, the people of Nephalia maintain a semblance of normalcy, buying and selling goods from across Innistrad in their bustling markets, setting out to sea in tiny fishing boats, or tilling the soggy earth in waterlogged fields.
